Package com.orientechnologies.orient.core.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OConfigurationChangeCallback
    Interface of actions to call in case of change of the configuration.
    OStorageClusterConfiguration  
    OStorageConfiguration  
    OStorageConfigurationUpdateListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OContextConfiguration
    Represents a context configuration where custom setting could be defined for the context only.
    OStorageClusterHoleConfiguration  
    OStorageConfiguration.IndexEngineData  
    OStorageConfigurationImpl
    Versions: 3 = introduced file directory in physical segments and data-segment id in clusters 4 = ?? 5 = ?? 6 = ?? 7 = ?? 8 = introduced cluster selection strategy as string 9 = introduced minimumclusters as string 12 = introduced record conflict strategy as string in both storage and paginated clusters 13 = introduced cluster status to manage cluster as "offline" with the new command "alter cluster status offline".
    OStorageDataHoleConfiguration  
    OStorageEntryConfiguration  
    OStorageFileConfiguration  
    OStoragePaginatedClusterConfiguration  
    OStorageSegmentConfiguration

    OGlobalConfiguration
    Keeps all configuration settings.
